UIControllers

Class requestbookController

  • java.lang.Object
    • UIControllers.requestbookController

  • public class requestbookController
extends java.lang.Object

    RequestBookController Class

    This class is used to control the booking requests.

    Bookings must be made atleast one day in advance

      • handleConfirmBooking

        public void handleConfirmBooking(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 java.text.ParseException,
                                 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        This function handles the onclick action of a user confiming the request to book a room if the user is an admin or faculty, the room is automatically booked. If Student, a request is sent to the admin.
        Parameters:
        event - actio event object handler
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws Exception when input or output stream not initialized
        java.text.ParseException - exception when there is an error in string parsing
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - exception thrown when requested class not found
